title: Heims Passive
body: Why cant Heimerdingers passive proc Ardent Censor and Windspeakers Blessing.

replies.body: unfortunately, heimerdinger's passive grants his allies a health regeneration buff, not direct healing. So it doesn't apply these effects.

Basically this. Heimerdinger's passive provides a Health Regeneration boost, not direct heals (like you'd get from Soraka, Taric or the Heal summoner spell), so Windspeaker's Blessing, Ardent Censor and similar "heal buffing" mechanics wont apply.
